channel.title: [508/525] United Scape new Updated!
channel.description:
[size=18pt]UnitedScape[/size]
I would like to personally thank "Battlecoo" on my server for helping me out.
Credits to Ftwkid for there base!
Also the black dragons hit like ...[s]78[/s] more like 81 so if you want to code them in as a hard boss to defeat, You can because its harder then anything else i believe!
Also, Fully working compiler for the people with the latest version of java downloaded!!!
[b]What i've added -[/b]
Eating without a weapon, New home, New train, New veng, (really funny if you have a sense of humor) Added godwars!, Added ::bandosmini! (for getting bandos warspear, bandos scimitar, and bandos whip!) Added new pkbox, Added new jad area, Added new skill area!, Added 2 new quests, Removed god items and weapons from shop (but ::gsmini and kbd give godswords still... :|) Made all hard monsters talk! EX: I'm a noob. But i still own you! (kalphite queen) Made all skills working! Made crystal mod weapon by - Adding more range bonus and making it should 4 times a second on monsters only! Made enchanted mod armour by - Adding 200 bonus to everything for top and bottom! And alot more! :D ;D :D ;D :D ;D :D ;D
Godwars- Has Saradomin Boss, Armadyl Boss, and Bandos Boss. They all fight back and drop correct items! ( drop rate middle)
Here are the pictures!
Here is the new home! [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss64/brian_dah_best/22.jpg[/img]
Here is the new train! [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss64/brian_dah_best/2.jpg[/img]
The same old shops... If i make v2 i will change. [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss64/brian_dah_best/222.jpg[/img]
The fun pk! [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss64/brian_dah_best/2222.jpg[/img]
Here are the 3 godwars boss pics!
Armadyl! [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss64/brian_dah_best/22222.jpg[/img] Bandos! [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss64/brian_dah_best/222222.jpg[/img] Saradomin! [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss64/brian_dah_best/2222222.jpg[/img]
Here is the new real pk! [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss64/brian_dah_best/22222222.jpg[/img]
Same old barrows, i find this way funner. Otherwise i would have made a barrows minigame. [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss64/brian_dah_best/222222222.jpg[/img]
The ::bandosmini rewards. [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss64/brian_dah_best/22222222222.jpg[/img]
New skills! (red is the new skillz i added! FTW) [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss64/brian_dah_best/222222222222.jpg[/img]
New jad area! (He scares me) :( [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss64/brian_dah_best/2222222222222.jpg[/img]
Here is the vengeance! (change if you like, just random funnyness) [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss64/brian_dah_best/vengownz.jpg[/img]
Here are some random ownage pictures!!@#@!##@$#@$% [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss64/brian_dah_best/zzzzzzz.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss64/brian_dah_best/zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss64/brian_dah_best/11.jpg[/img]
Pest control- Pest control i'd say about 10% maybe little more. It has the portals and the monsters and all that but, The doors dont work, the portals respawn, the monsters respawn while the portal is dead, and the boat to there doesn't work. :| If i make a v2 i will fix all those problems and more. Oh yes, and when you dds spec the portal, it fights back! :D
So please, Should i make a v2? Here is a basic pic of pc (numbers are coords) [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss64/brian_dah_best/noob.jpg[/img]
Server also has - Train2 Drags1 Drags2 Edgeville Hangout Castle wars Kalphite queen Drop party area Slayer Huge command base And More!!!
"The secret tree" - In edgeville "::edge" walk to the east of the bank by the river, and you'll see a willow tree. Click on the Willow Tree and it will give you full Bandos Armour and Bandos Godsword.
*
I deleted all character files, moreinfo, chatlogs (over 9k Kb even when i checked and deleted every now and then), and other logs for quicker download and easier file searching!

@Calendar_b34 wrote:

[size=18pt]UnitedScape[/size]

I would like to personally thank “Battlecoo” on my server for helping me out.

Credits to Ftwkid for there base!

Also the black dragons hit like …78 more like 81 so if you want to code them in as a hard boss to defeat, You can
because its harder then anything else i believe!

Also, Fully working compiler for the people with the latest version of java downloaded!!!

What i’ve added -

Eating without a weapon,
New home,

Added ::bandosmini! (for getting bandos warspear, bandos scimitar, and bandos whip!)

Added 2 new quests,

Made enchanted mod armour by - Adding 200 bonus to everything for top and bottom!
And alot more! ;D ;D ;D ;D

Godwars- Has Saradomin Boss, Armadyl Boss, and Bandos Boss. They all fight back and drop correct items! ( drop rate middle)

The same old shops… If i make v2 i will change.

Same old barrows, i find this way funner. Otherwise i would have made a barrows minigame.

If i make a v2 i will fix all those problems and more. Oh yes, and when you dds spec the portal, it fights back!

So please, Should i make a v2? Here is a basic pic of pc (numbers are coords)

Edgeville

Drop party area

And More!!!

“The secret tree” - In edgeville “::edge” walk to the east of the bank by the river, and you’ll see a willow tree. Click on the
Willow Tree and it will give you full Bandos Armour and Bandos Godsword.

every now and then), and other logs for quicker download and easier
